Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is performed across all cases
Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that directly precedes SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 appearing before SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to its frequency before SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that eventually lead to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences per case variant involving reviewer assignment delays (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week, SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 followed by a second reminder (Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2) without an intervening SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that occurs after at least two instances of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 events that are part of cycles involving repeated reviewer invitations and declines
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 appears but SW-Reviewer Agreed never occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 relative to the total number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurring in the context of overdue reviewer selection (e.g., after SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Number of variants in which Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is followed within three steps by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that contributes to successful reviewer acquisition (i.e., leads to SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same assignment round)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in variants that result in SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit versus those that result in SW-EIC Accept
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
